summary: Crash in [@ abort | glrAppleSyncState] (WebGL crashes on 10.12/10.13 on Intel HD 3000, affects Google Maps)

[@ BaseAllocator::malloc]

[@ malloc]
[@ _sigtramp]
[@ libsystem_platform.dylib@0x1f59]
[@ abort | glDrawArraysInstanced_STD_GL3Exec]
